website_summaries.verdict: One of the best fly rods on the market, offering good balance and casting action on par with rods costing hundreds of dollars more.
pros: Very accurate and balanced casting, without having to work the rod too much
Fits together nicely, with clear alignment marks
Storage tube is rugged and good for travel
cons: Rod tip can break under load
Casting action isn’t fast enough for some

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod and Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: On the first outing with the new rod , I snapped the tip in half as i was loading my kayak. Very disappointed I contacted the Seller on the weekend, to see it was possible to purchase a tip section. They had a new tip in the mail Monday morning. I purchased the fly to replace may old trusty 30 year old rod secondary rod. The quality and performance this rod has made it my primary rod. It is a great rod and look forward for a long use of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sus C

customer_reviews.title: Just wow
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the value of this thing. Took it fishing today and felt like one of my $300+ rods. I even have a hand made rod my uncle made for me and this rivals it. I guess manufacturers have come a long way. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the O ther guys $300 rod!
customer_reviews.text: This rod is awesome. I started fly fishing recently and bought a cheap rod in a kit somewhere else. It was not easy to use and was basically a piece of junk. I took free classes through a popular fly fishing rod manufacturer and was able to use their $300 rods in the class. The Tailwater Outfitters rod is just as good as though expensive rods. I love this rod and will be buying an 8 weight when I save the money.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Petrovich

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beginner fly fisherman, and this rod made things easy. Fast action is nice, though sometimes takes some delicate handling. Carrying tube is great, sectioned off for each section of the rod so they won't scrape or get stuck on each other. Light weight and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chinese made fast action rod and great price
customer_reviews.text: Beauty of rod. I bought the 5 weight and used it for the first time last yesterday. Cast very well, especially cutting into the wind at Clear lake in Oregon. I got stuck into some big rainbows there, the smallest a 15", and was able to horse them away from the submerged tree stumps with no problem. Nice Chinese made fast action rod and great price. If you're looking for a 9ft, fast action 5 weight, this is a good one to buy. You get a great rod and not out a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy Tor

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good rod for the price! It’s a really good rod anyways. It feels just as good as some of my really spendy rods. I bought it for a gift for my Dad and was surprised pleasantly. I would definitely recommend this rod to any beginner for sure but even for a more experienced angler this is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: CerchOne

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice rod, and a fantastic value. If I had a complaint TW rods need some sort of indicator where the reel seats underneath the cork candle. A small dot would work well just as they use for connecting sections of the rod (It is very difficult to see) but other than that great rod for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Feels and performs like a higher end rod
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fly rod to take on camping and backpacking trips, and so far I have been very pleased with the performance. I'm no fly fishing expert, but have been doing it long enough to separate the good from the bad. This rod definitely fits the good category, with nice craftsmanship and durability. To me it seems like a more higher end rod, and I'm happy with how it performs for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Tailwater Outfitters Toccoa 5wt Fly Rod
customer_reviews.text: The fly rod was used this weekend after rigging it with a Piscifun reel and fly line. The rod worked great. The fast action responds very quickly to the fishmans wishes allowing all types of casts to move that fly around. I particular like the line up dots on the rod for true passing of the line through the guides. I am very satisfied with the rod and outfit I purchased. Jeff Fitch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rod. Use it more these days then my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great rod. Use it more these days then my more expensive rod. Put an old pfleuger reel on it. Probably caught over 60 fish this summer on it! Great rod. Bought the 3 weight. **Update** I have likely caught over a hundred trout on this 3w rod. I have no reservations about telling people to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Dan&Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality ... great price ... heavy case, but provides superior protection.
customer_reviews.text: Great trout rod for the price ... I normally build my own rods, but ran out of time before a trip. The quality on this rod is top notch. I can only find one characteristic regarding this purchase that I would improve, and it has nothing to do with the rod ... the case is very heavy. It certainly will protect the rod. I would bet a car could run over it and not damage the rod inside. Since I plan to pack this into my backpack, I plan to not use the case. It is far to heavy IMO. I still give it five stars since I would gladly purchase this rod for the price listed without the case.
customer_reviews.author: clark d ford

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a light rod for the brookies and smaller trout this rod can't be beat. It has great action and makes dropping your fly where you want it much less work. I am new to fly fishing this year and also have a 5/6wt rod. It's nice too but this 3wt makes learning easier for me. Jump on it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on this rod
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on this rod, got it for my wife to start casting with and ordered another after the first time out. I don't write reviews, live in Montana and fish alot have paid 4 times more for less,rod loads well and is easy to time. Will be buying a third soon perfect mid speed action. Impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Grips feel good. Action feels smooth with a double haul
customer_reviews.text: I order 2 of the 8wt rods for a salt water trip coming up. The rods are balanced with the reels. Grips feel good. Action feels smooth with a double haul. Over all appearance looks great! Rod tube has individual slots to hold each piece and is well made. Next challenge will be on the flats with these rods. If they perform well there then I will be purchasing a few more for freshwater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod
customer_reviews.text: I caught a 6 lb catfish on this rod the first time out. It performed great. I can cast really far with heavy flies. I like the extra touch of the alignment dots on each segment. Five stars for such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Dmoose

customer_reviews.title: Really nice rod for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get such an inexpensive rod, but I'm impressed. It casts very nicely. I'll be looking into the same brand when I'm looking for another weight rod in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun M. Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this rod has a great action. I bought it in a pinch as my Sage rod was halfway across the country and I got invited on a last minute fishing trip. I was extremely happy with the rod for the price point and plan on continuing using it as my knock around rod.
customer_reviews.author: BrianTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: But the balance and action for casting is as good as any rod I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Used only on one fishing trip, and got skunked. So I can't say anything about durability or how well it works with a fish on. But the balance and action for casting is as good as any rod I have ever used. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: justpidlin

customer_reviews.title: A great casting rod for snook fishing
customer_reviews.text: This is my second fly rod. My previous one was an Orvis. The Tailwater is of much better quality. I can cast it a bit further, with much more control.
customer_reviews.author: SRQ Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner rod but tip broke
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner rod to learn on. I use it a couple time a week. Very fast action. The top inch or two broke off the other day though. I’m going to contact the company to try and get a new tip piece. Interested to see how their customer service is. I’ll update my review when I hear back from them. If they have good warranty on a rod this cheap I’d switch the review to 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Solid fly rod and for the price is a steal. I got a buddy this as a backup rod for a trip and he ended up using it as his main rod the whole trip. Fairly stiff and fast action but can get some great casts out there. Really performs well and for the price, you have a winner here.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Prichard

customer_reviews.title: Other that that it preformed as good as well as a high end rod costing much ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving 4 stars is because the rod is a bit on the heavy side. Other that that it preformed as good as well as a high end rod costing much more.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Rod feels great while dry casting and goes together nicely with identification ...
customer_reviews.text: Rod feels great while dry casting and goes together nicely with identification marks. I added a Piscifun sword 3 wt reel and can't wait to use them both together.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rod
customer_reviews.text: A great fly rod! I am very happy with the rod. I have less than a year fly fishing experience. I don't have anything to compare it to. However, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JDub

customer_reviews.title: Versatility for small creeks up to larger lakes and rivers.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for anything from small creeks, larger rivers, and small lakes all around central Texas catching sunfish and bass. No trout yet but soon. With the 3 weight rod and 2 weight line and 3 weight reel from piscifun I have had some serious fun catching and landing bass up to 4-5 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jake B

customer_reviews.title: Great rod - Great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to fish some of the smaller streams here in NC. I love this pole! the action was was great and casting was very accurate. I lot of fun t fish! The quality for this price point is excellent. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat the price for a nice rod like this.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected for the price. The rod action is fast, however you must match your fly line to the rod to get any results. The case is sweet, now I can relax when putting my gear in the car. This rod is matched with and old manual reel that is over 60 years old, makes for a nice combo.
customer_reviews.author: J. Niemann

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great choice for any fly fisher!
customer_reviews.text: I have been fly fishing for over 50 years so please take that and the fact that I have had my own fly fishing related business into account. These rods are absolutely worth every penny. I have a 5 weight and an 8 weight and I am extremely pleased. These are fast rods so if distance is what you need sometimes, these can do it. Beautiful cork and finishing. Someone gave the Chinese good fabrication information and it was faithfully adheared to. A+
customer_reviews.author: John Ciulla

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I used this rod for a bonefish trip and the guide complimented how well it casts with my reel. Looking forward to taking it on more adventures. Will purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice rod for the price. The hard case it comes with is of good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: good value. I'll write more later after I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this rod for a week. Casts well , good value . I'll write more later after I have had more time with it. So far So good
customer_reviews.author: William B. Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought a really high end fly rod but this rod performs just as well if not better than the mid range priced rods that I own. Great product- worth every dollar and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D.

customer_reviews.title: Performed well.
customer_reviews.text: Fished Northern Colorado and this rod performed very well. Bought the 3wt for small stream and also needed a new pack rod. Have Orvis, Sage and St Croix rods but really liked the action on this afforable alternative. Have more fishing next week and plan on using this rod.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jones

customer_reviews.title: Rod in great shape. Caught my first catfish on a fly ...
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Fast deliver. Rod in great shape. Caught my first catfish on a fly rod first time out with this rod. Casts well, handled the 6 lb catfish without issue. I would purchase again. Bought their fly reel to go with the rod. Im even more impressed with the reel. Smooth drag. Makes for a nice looking and great performing package for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It really does fish like a 4 wt good fast action with 4wt line
customer_reviews.text: I made this choice based on price and a few reviews. It really does fish like a 4 wt good fast action with 4wt line. I caught a nice 1-1/2" Tilipia which it handled just as good as my Fenwick Well made storage tube. Here's some advice. Put a good Reel and Line on this Rod and you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great rod, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love using this rod. The price was fantastic and it feels great. Light, balanced, and good action. Nice case too. You wont go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great action for the price. This is the first fly rod I have ever purchased but have used enough to know what a decent rod should feel like. I would recommend this to anyone looking to get started or just looking for a solid rod at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: A decent fly rod.
customer_reviews.text: Taken this rod on a few trips. Medium fast action. Comes in a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: NICE FLYROD!
customer_reviews.text: Rod works fine. No problem, performs as expected. Fished with it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Cowen

customer_reviews.title: But this weekend I am taking it to Fort Smith MT and fish the big horn and will be able to give a review upon the pool but as of
customer_reviews.text: Well it showed up six days late but all in all we did have a snowstorm up here in North Dakota so I really can't complain too much. But this weekend I am taking it to Fort Smith MT and fish the big horn and will be able to give a review upon the pool but as of now it does seem to have some good flags with awesome action with pretend cas review upon the pool but as of now it does seem to have some good flex with awesome action with pretend casting..
customer_reviews.author: andy monette

customer_reviews.title: I liked it well enough I ended up getting 2 of them, nice rod
customer_reviews.text: I really like this real the quality is great and it has a nice enough stiff back to handle bigger fish
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerJeff V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rod and crazy light. Def worth the money and more
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Miney
customer_reviews.text: Have an expensive fly rod too but for the money this is a quality rod
customer_reviews.author: Rharan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rod. Most other inexpensive rods advertised as "fast action" really don't come close. The Toccoa 5 wt is much better. I loaded it with a 5 WT, WF line 1/2 wt heavier, and it is easy to load and casts very well. Even the pro at the fly shop where I bought the fly line was impressed with the action. No problem handling several shad last week. It comes with a really nice rod case. This a a great buy on some very good equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D.

customer_reviews.title: Great 5wt at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing fly rod for the money. I got the 5wt. Just got back from 4 days of hard fishing and used it everyday. It worked just as good as the $400 that I normally fish with. The only reason for not giving it 5 stars is I want to see how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: MF-Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: So far so great
customer_reviews.text: Just received it yesterday. Extremely happy. The tube is tough as hell the rod is light and feels great. Have not used it yet I will update. But so far feels 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Freddy G

customer_reviews.title: Good rod carrier and great action on the rod
customer_reviews.text: Caught a ton of fish with this 3wt. Good rod carrier and great action on the rod. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Niteowl5

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice rod. Nice form and finish. Feels a little soft for an 8wt but so far so good. Definitely worth there money I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Bang for buck!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you wont find better. If you do let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rod. Fishes just as well as much more ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rod. Fishes just as well as much more expensive rods. Was hesitant to order, but very glad I did. Casts smooth and accurate. 3 weight has plenty of backbone for what it is needed for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Have not seen anything better in this price range
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Ringgold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the price for a 9' rod. Action seems to be good. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado

customer_reviews.title: It’s junk
customer_reviews.text: Broke in two the first time I used it had a crappie on and it broke. Very disgusted because they say my window for a return has closed. Don’t buy this rod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice looking rod and the case
customer_reviews.text: very nice looking rod and the case, small enough to fit in my suitcase, I can't wait to use it in the Bahamas, for bonefish...
customer_reviews.author: Julio C.

customer_reviews.title: I have not had time to go fishing but I think it will be fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement rod for a unit that was broken. I think it is the rod I needed to replace the broken unit. I have not had time to go fishing but I think it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fly rod
customer_reviews.text: This rod is great. For a first time fly fishermen this rod is insanely easy to learn on my friend is teaching me how to fly fish and is going to buy one. He likes it better than his orvis rod.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fly rod, action is as good as one I have that is twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: cnicows

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Pole, good price, delivered fast. Cant say anything better. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Crapser

customer_reviews.title: Well made rod
customer_reviews.text: Bought an 8wt for king salmon. Being my first fly rod I wanted to buy something that wasn’t to expensive. This product was perfect I’ve used it twice and landed 3 Kings already the rod held up great. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Lupino

customer_reviews.title: I love the protective case
customer_reviews.text: the fly rod arrived on time and as described. I love the protective case. UnfortunatelyI have not had time to try ti out.
customer_reviews.author: jmwrn

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice looking rod fished it for about 2 hrs
customer_reviews.text: Received the rod ahead of time, it's a nice looking rod fished it for about 2 hrs. Was a pleasure matche'd up nice with my psicifun 5 wt reel hardly know it's in your hand. Hooked one fish rod performed well.would definitely recommend this rod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice for the$$$$
customer_reviews.text: so far so good,still testing , but it is a great stick to cast with and look at it,fast actin...be ready
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bielecki

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive
customer_reviews.text: Very responsive rod, used only once so far, but I think this will be my go to rod.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mrs DW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rod, good fast action and great price for what you get. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I am rooky and the equipment is enough for me
customer_reviews.author: fabiovel

customer_reviews.title: The rod has surprisingly good action and can support a 3wt (fast action) or ...
customer_reviews.text: The rod has surprisingly good action and can support a 3wt (fast action) or a medium/fast action using a 4wt line. The only problem I have is with the finishing. The top 3 guides and the tip top were not wrapped well.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Jacked
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it on a fishing site, but I did, put it together, walked out side, and then I giggled it and whiped the pole. It felt great. Thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get one if you're looking!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic rod especially for the price!!! Great action and control
customer_reviews.author: Scott West

customer_reviews.title: Great rod and price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rod for my husband, he hasn't used it yet but loves the quality. Great rod and price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice rods but seem to have some breaking problems in tip section.
customer_reviews.author: W.Ruzycky

customer_reviews.title: How it handles on the river
customer_reviews.text: Heading out this weekend for Wyoming to test this rod out. Overall appearance is excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Manrock54

customer_reviews.title: Good rod
customer_reviews.text: It seems super sturdy and doesn’t feel cheap at all, amazing deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely built rod. Very well balanced. Can't wait to get out and use it this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rod
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son in law's birthday and he loves it! Carry case is well made and has a pocket for ID.
customer_reviews.author: R Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic at twice the price!
customer_reviews.text: I own Sage rods that are $300++ and this rod is better! Great quality in every way!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The rod is working great! I put it to work as soon as ...
customer_reviews.text: The rod is working great! I put it to work as soon as I got. Started slammn salmon with it in Kodiak Alaska. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very balanced fly rod
customer_reviews.text: This fly rod is light weight and very Balanced . I got the 8 wt and it works great with 8 or 9 wt line .. Big flies like Clouser 4-5" are no problem for this rod. I will buy another one !
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best rod for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used all types of rods and this is by far the most impressive one when considering the price of it. Has the quality of a $200-300 rod. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Kiser

customer_reviews.title: This is a remarkably good product at a very inexpensive price
customer_reviews.text: The fly rod performs as advertised. This is a remarkably good product at a very inexpensive price. I am satisfied with both the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful well crafted rod. Like the customer service giving care for the rod. Just ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: Allen MacDonell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is a fly fisherman he loves it
customer_reviews.author: yvonne haughton

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice rod. The finish is good and the action ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a nice rod. The finish is good and the action is great, casting small flies very accurately. A good value for the dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Ddb

customer_reviews.title: Also I would like to see more Tailwater Outfittersproducts to complete a balanced ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this 4 piece rod to make my bike rides more interesting . Pedaling with a destination.Rod packs up secure in the case.mounted a tube on bike.From what I have seen the only thing this rod lacks is my skill. Will update. Also I would like to see more Tailwater Outfittersproducts to complete a balanced outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Charles I.

customer_reviews.title: Best Rod Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, very easy to assemble with dots to line up, casts line like $200 + rods, and pulls in fighting trout with ease!
customer_reviews.author: RRT85

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great action. More moderate than fast but a great feel and solid action. Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FISH AZ
customer_reviews.text: Looks great... Feels great... Can't wait to use it on lakes in the White Mountains of AZ.
customer_reviews.author: Russ S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rod, the craftsmanship is superb, for this price and probably 2 to 3 times what this rod costs I dont believe you can find a nicer fly pole. I'm also very impressed with the customer service and follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Mcdoc

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality rod
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality rod. I have used in once since my purchase and I have had no issues with the action.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and on green river this week and rod was great! No problems
customer_reviews.text: Fished in flaming gorge and on green river this week and rod was great! No problems. Also fished with tfo in same configuration and there was no difference b/t the two
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rod. Far casting. Build quality is excellent. Perfect for our Montana rivers.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit and finish are beautiful. Bought as a gift and won't know about actual fishing until Spring.
customer_reviews.author: jodi Cyphers

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and casting !!! Very nice quality indeed!!!
customer_reviews.text: A really sweet 3wt. rod. Beautiful. Great feel. Casts effortlessly. I took it to Bass Pro Shoos while getting my new reel spooked and we were casting with this rod. The fly Dept expert there LIVED it. And - he called it "a real looker!" I cannot WAIT to get out on the water with it and hook into one of my pumpkinseed panfish or a nice largemouth here in So Jersey.
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very happy with purchase. The quality of the rod is excellent and I'm very happy with the action!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased at the value and the quality of craftmenship
customer_reviews.author: Landon George

customer_reviews.title: Great Fly Rod
customer_reviews.text: This fly rod has great action. Quality is excellent. Great rod for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price on a graphite rod
customer_reviews.text: Great price on a graphite rod, and I checked Cabela's, Bass Pros Shops, Big Five Sporting Goods and Gander Mountain. This is perfectly balanced with the proper tip action for a 5 WT rod. I also appreciate the rod tube as well made, not an after thought. Fast delivery and just in time for the mayfly hatch. The alignment dots make this easy to assemble in early morning low light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Byron J. Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Redfish slayer
customer_reviews.text: Great rod for the price. Red fish were easily handled by the rod. Able to cast quick and effortlessly
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Adams

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price scare you off.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality fly rod. Excellent action. The 3 wt is a true 3 wt, moderately fast. Fit and finish rival rods costing hundreds more. The only thing it doesn't have is a fancy name you can show off. Good case, Excellent cork, 10 guides including 2 stripper guides. Cool alignment marks. Attractive dark blue and silver wraps. Priced less than my Cortland 7' 3wt cost 20 years ago. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: SmokieOkie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice rod for the money. I would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Nenad Despotovic

product_meta.title: Tailwater Outfitters Toccoa Fly Rod: High Performance 4 Piece, Fast Action IM8 Graphite with Rod Tube.
product_meta.description:
This rod easily competes with rods two or three times the price. There's rarely a need to spend hundreds of dollars or more on a fly rod, and this rod will prove that to you. 

 Product Specifics 

 - This is a 4 piece, travel ready 5wt. rod, but will handle 6wt. lines also. **Note that we offer a 3wt. rod as well - look in the size drop down above. 

 - It's fast action for longer casts, handling windy conditions, and has backbone for determined fish.

- An extremely versatile 9 feet long.

- Made from IM8 graphite (carbon fiber). It's designed for maximum sensitivity and durability. So you can focus on presentations and fighting fish, not breaking your rod.

- Your rod will be protected in a four compartment cordura rod tube.

- The rod tube includes an adjustable shoulder strap for worry free bushwhacking and long approaches. Sling it over your shoulder and go.

- Assembles easily via alignment dots, which help get the sections lined up right the first time.

- Stylish dark gray color: looks great, and is a natural color to help avoid spooking fish with overly flashy or distracting colors, thread, etc.

- Half well, high quality cork handle. Comfortable and avoids fatigue for casting-heavy days.

This rod is intended to meet you where you're at: a great first rod to enjoy for years, or a solid choice your go-to streams for the more experienced fly fisher. If you ever get the chance, we encourage you to stack it up against rods that cost two or three times more. 

This listing is for the 5wt. rod only . Stay tuned for more offerings from us.
feature_bullets: An extremely versatile 9ft. 5/6 weight, IM8 graphite rod for durability, accuracy and performance
Convenient & travel friendly four piece, with alignment dots for fast setup
Ceramic stripping guides, chrome snake guides for smooth gliding fly lines
Machined aluminum reel seat with double lock rings for sturdy reel attachment
Half well cork handle helps casting accuracy, avoids fatigue. Rod tube for safe storage.
